post:
Hello :)

BunnyCDN is back with another Black Friday offer. We're giving a 25% recharge bonus with every payment done on November 23rd. Like last year, we've also thrown together a spcecial LET promo code. The code gives you a $5 account credit with no payment required and it expires/extends your balance for up to 3 months. This can be easily extended by making a payment.

We offer two pricing tiers aimed at different requirements. Both are 100% Pay As You Go with a $10/year minimum payment

<br />

**Premium Tier (34 POPs, any region can also be toggled on/off)**
$0.010/GB for Europe & North America

$0.030/GB for Asia & Oceania

$0.045/GB for South America

$0.060/GB for South Africa



**Volume Tier (8 POPs)**
$5/TB global rate and as low as $2.5/TB after 2PB/month

Enabled pops: Amsterdam, Bucharest, Paris, Prague, Dallas, Los Angeles, Miami, New York City

<br />

**Some of our features:**

 - 200Gbps+ Network
 - 100% SSD hardware
 - 34 PoPs
 - Free SSL for custom hostnames with Let's Encrypt integration
 - HTTP/2
 - Brotli
 - Edge Rules
 - Toggle any region ON/OFF
 - Secure URL tokens
 - HTTP Video delivery
 - 95% Average Cache HIT rate
 - Instant setup with a super simple control panel
 - Friendly team and a cute name :)
 - CDN accelerated cloud storage ($0.01/GB of storage)
 - Block IPs, countries
 - Hotlinking protection
 - 99.99%+ Uptime guarantee

And lots more :)

<br />

Promo code: LETFRIDAY-2018

For more info, you can have a look at https://bunnycdn.com
<br />

**Our Network**
We've expanded quite a bit in 2018 and now have 34 PoPs over 6 continents.
